text: You Never Can Tell may refer to: * You Never Can Tell (play), an 1899 play by G. Bernard Shaw * "You Never Can Tell" (song), a 1964 song by Chuck Berry * You Never Can Tell (1920 film), a romantic comedy starring Jack Mulhall and Bebe Daniels * You Never Can Tell (1951 film), a comedy starring Dick Powell
title: You Never Can Tell
